Canadians pay tribute to former prime minister Brian MulroneyCanadians shrugged off the cold and light snow in Ottawa on Tuesday as they lined up to pay respects to former prime minister Brian Mulroney, who died on February 29 at the age of 84. Tue, 19 Mar 2024 16:53:06 GMT PTWTQCRXXZOHRGFHQNS4M7ZDH4 https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/canadians-pay-tribute-former-prime-brian-mulroney-2024-03-19/Reuters世界美洲
Canada to give more than C$40 million to help buy artillery shells for UkraineCanada will give more than C$40 million ($29.40 million) to a Czech-led initiative aimed at buying 800,000 artillery shells from third nations for Ukraine, Defence Minister Bill Blair said on Tuesday. Tue, 19 Mar 2024 16:48:31 GMT HX3HQLE63FLPDHPMEIZKFVL5XE https://www.reuters.com/world/canada-gives-more-than-c40-million-to-help-buy-artillery-shells-ukraine-2024-03-19/Reuters世界
White House: US-Israel meeting on Rafah likely early next weekU.S. and Israeli officials will likely meet early next week in Washington to discuss Israel's military operation in Rafah, White House spokesperson Karine Jean-Pierre said on Tuesday, citing deep concerns about reports of imminent famine in Gaza. Tue, 19 Mar 2024 16:34:21 GMT 2UUCI32XHNJCDDO4AKOWV477CE https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/white-house-us-israel-meeting-rafah-likely-early-next-week-2024-03-19/Reuters世界中东地区
Trump says he could have to sell assets to cover $454 million fraud judgmentDonald Trump on Tuesday said on social media that he may be forced to mortgage or sell parts of his real estate business holdings at "fire sale prices" to secure a bond to cover a $454 million civil fraud judgment in New York. Tue, 19 Mar 2024 16:32:02 GMT CECURWK3FFPOZBC萨拉斯https://www.reuters.com/world/us/trump-says-he-could-have-sell-assets-cover-454-million-fraud-judgment-2024-03-19/Jack Queen世界美国
Police parade 'robo-dog' helper in Spain's MalagaPolice in Malaga took a robot dog on a trial patrol through the centre of the Spanish city on Tuesday to the joy of bystanders, some of whom imitated its clunky gait or introduced their pets to the whirring contraption with flashing lights on top. Tue, 19 Mar 2024 16:25:11 GMT莱伊兹DSA2VNN3AXX7JPQFOHXDI https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/police-parade-robo-dog-helper-spain-malaga-2024-03-19/Reuters世界欧洲
Bolivia seizes $450 million of cocaine in second-biggest drug bustBolivian police have carried out the second-largest drug bust in the country's history, seizing more than 7.2 tons of cocaine destined for Belgium with a street value of nearly half a billion U.S. dollars, the interior minister said. Tue, 19 Mar 2024 16:09:44 GMT TQNW3GABU5LRTKHOLOCW4JY42A https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/bolivia-seizes-450-million-cocaine-second-biggest-drug-bust-2024-03-19/Daniel Ramos世界美洲
Mums ban outdoor fun as air pollution worsens in Vietnam capitalNga Trang has nearly stopped going out in the evening and forbids her kids to play outdoors after school because air pollution from burning trash gets worse in her neighbourhood in Hanoi in the late afternoon. Tue, 19 Mar 2024 16:04:22 GMT AIMH4HZRVZOUZGDJ3MBY4NOLVE https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/mums-ban-outdoor-fun-air-pollution-worsens-vietnam-capital-2024-03-19/Francesco Guarascio, Khanh Vu可持续发展气候与能源
Ombudsman raises concern over EU migration deal with EgyptThe European Union's rights watchdog raised concern on Tuesday about the bloc's new 7.4 billion euro ($8.03 billion) agreement with Egypt that includes provisions to curb migration, saying it falls short on human rights safeguards. Tue, 19 Mar 2024 16:01:46 GMT QWQ6MA3Q2FPRDAG3FJ77PJZE4Q https://www.reuters.com/world/ombudsman-raises-concern-over-eu-migration-deal-with-egypt-2024-03-19/Nette Noestlinger世界
NYU urges dismissal of antisemitism lawsuit, says it acted 'decisively'New York University said it has moved "decisively" to root out antisemitism on its campus, and that a lawsuit by Jewish students claiming they have been mistreated should be dismissed. Tue, 19 Mar 2024 15:58:26 GMT USFQCKPX3RML3OVYKWCAKVANZI https://www.reuters.com/legal/new-urges-dismissal-antisemitism-law-says-it-acted-decisively-2024-03-19/Jonathan Stempel合法的
Kate needs to be here, Prince William says on latest tripPrince William said his wife "needs to be sat here" during a visit to northern England on Tuesday, a day after the first footage emerged of his wife Kate since her surgery two months ago which showed the royal looking fit and healthy. Tue, 19 Mar 2024 15:22:42 GMT 7BHLDM52L5I63CJDUXHXYCEWQQ https://www.reuters.com/world/uk/british-royals-shrug-off-speculation-about-kate-king-charles-2024-03-19/Michael Holden世界英国
Palestinian clans and factions step in to protect Gaza aid, sources sayArmed and masked men from an array of clans and factions have started providing security for aid convoys in Gaza as Hamas tries to keep its clout in the enclave, Palestinian officials and sources in the militant group say.
